resources.string: Which scale or scales are represented in the picture?
Which cadence is a progression from V (dominant) to I (tonic)?
Which composer made a large use of this cadence to become one of his most characteristic and recognisable musical thumbprints?
Which scale is formed with the interval sequence: whole, whole, half, whole, whole, whole, half?
Which interval sequence forms the Harmonic Minor scale?
W H W W H WH H
